title: Metrics is not displayed and is miss, but the blockchain exporter displays the miss
body: I connected to promethus and grafana. Metrics shows no loss of att and prop. But when I checked the beaconNode exporter, I found the miss att„ÄÅprop. There is another question. Why does it happen Sync Participation is 0%

BeaconNode Log time="2023-01-04 11:37:05" level=info msg="Finished applying state transition" attestations=128 payloadHash=0x15b081d9e193 prefix=blockchain slot=5500683 syncBitsCount=503 txCount=243 "2023-01-04 11:37:05" level=info msg="Synced new block" block=0x87a3d598... epoch=171896 finalizedEpoch=171894 finalizedRoot=0xab2ca48c... prefix=blockchain slot=5500683 But when the exporter is 2023-01-04 11:36:59 in this slot, it seems that it is late, but I don't know why

We have 6 validators whose balance has decreased.  :( 
validator log 
```
time="2023-01-04   11:34:47" level=info msg="Attestation schedule"   attesterDutiesAtSlot=7 prefix=validator pubKeys=[0xb43765a78cbb   0x977e8377cc12 0x893330f3fd2b 0x8ddeebd6aa35 0xb4610c1aefad 0xa07e8a6adf25   0x8bae03b6debc] slot=5500683 slotInEpoch=11 timeTillDuty=2m12s   totalAttestersInEpoch=68
```
